thread.title: Carl Parker
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Carl Parker

author: Carl Parker
title: Carl Parker
text: I had two gift cards that I had not used, as I didn't need anything at the time they were issued. After they were issued, I changed Internet providers. I realized later that I had not saved the card numbers or pins to go with them. I wrote B & H an email and asked if they still had them in their system. I gentleman by the name of Jerry S. wrote back the next day and said he had found two I had, but one had expired. He sent me the information to use them and renewed the expired gift card so I could use it also. B & H is a great company with customer service that cannot be beat. I'm a customer for life.
